sentences: Dina Barberini (17 March 1862 – 26 December 1932) was an Italian operatic soprano who had an active international career from the 1880s into the early part of the 20th century.
After giving her farewell opera performance at the Opéra de Monte-Carlo, she taught singing out of her home in Milan.
She died there in 1932 at the age of 70.
